headline: Companies
text.1:
This visualization shows how many companies receive data and which industries those companies operate in.

It might be surprising to see that data end up in industries that users would not expect. Those industries often provide a hint about the actual or additional business model behind a service.
text.2: Sie sehen so, ob z.B. Daten aus der Interaktion mit (featured company) bei Firmen in der Branche (Werbung/ Marking) landen.
